title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.21 - Fare evasion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.21 - Fare evasion

State Regulations

No person shall obtain rail, subway, bus, air, taxi or any
other public transportation service without payment of the lawful charge
therefor. A person who shall be upon a rail transit vehicle and who shall lack
proof of payment of the required fare shall be presumed to be in violation of
this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1151.21

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
